title: Suzuki Motorcycle Sept sales rise 1% to 99,185 units
description: Suzuki Motorcycle India reported a 1 per cent rise in September sales, reaching 99,185 units. Domestic sales dropped to 77,263 units, while exports surged 55 per cent to 21,922 units. The first half of the fiscal year saw a 16 per cent growth in the domestic market. The company remains optimistic for the festive season.
